fleximageadmin-summary: On this special page, do this simple thing and earn wonders
fleximage_welcome: Welcome to the FlexImage base extension
fleximage_upldefimg_ok: Succeeded to check and/or import the required default FlexImage images from allocation:
fleximage_upldefimg_nok: Failed to check and/or import the required default FlexImage images from allocation:
fleximage_upldefimg_noresponce: No responce from the shell command. Most likely the '''php BIN executable''' $wf_QBox_PHP_Bin location is set wrong
